risk.message: You are an aggressive investor, you seek high returns, and accept volatility. You're comfortable taking significant risks for the potential of high returns.

advisor.title: Aggressive Investor
goals: Tolerate short-term losses for long-term gains

portfolio.Growth Equity Funds: Invest in companies with strong earnings growth
portfolio.Technology / Innovation ETFs: Targeted growth in AI, cloud, biotech, etc.
portfolio.Actively Managed Funds: Try to outperform the market via expert management

tips: Maintain a small percentage (10–20%) in bonds or stable funds for downside protection
Even aggressive investors should limit high-risk assets to a portion of portfolio
